history.proof: intros. apply Rbar_le_trans with (u n). apply H. qauto l: on depth: 3use: Sup_seq_le, is_sup_seq_lub, Sup_seq_correct.

exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> Rbar M : R n : nat H : Rbar_le M (u n) Unable to unify "match Sup_seq ?M2368 with | Finite x => match Sup_seq ?M2369 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Sup_seq ?M2369 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "match u n with | Finite x => match Sup_seq u with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Sup_seq u with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end".

In environment u : nat -> Rbar M : R n : nat H : Rbar_le M (u n) Unable to unify "Rbar_is_upper_bound (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = ?M2368 n) ?M2369 /\\ (forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = ?M2368 n) b -> Rbar_le ?M2369 b)" with "match u n with | Finite x => match Sup_seq u with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Sup_seq u with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end".

In environment u : nat -> Rbar M : R n : nat H : Rbar_le M (u n) Unable to unify "match Sup_seq ?M2368 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M2368 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M2368 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M2368 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M2368 n) M end" with "match u n with | Finite x => match Sup_seq u with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Sup_seq u with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end".

original: intros u M n H. apply Rbar_le_trans with (u n). apply H. apply Sup_seq_le. intros n. apply is_sup_seq_lub. apply Sup_seq_correct.
